about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Shree OSFM E-Mobility Limited provides transportation services to employees of large multinational companies in major Indian cities. The company operates a fleet of more than 1475 vehicles, including small cars, sedans, SUVs, luxury cars and buses. Of these, 217 vehicles are owned by the company, while the rest are leased from various providers.

Shree OSFM operates on an "asset-light" model. Typical operating parameters are a monthly rental, per kilometre, per passenger trip and package mode.

The company has branches in 42 locations in cities such as Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Pune, Bengaluru and Kolkata. Shree OSFM E-Mobility's clients include JP Morgan, Morgan Stanley, Cape Gemini, Accenture etc.

The service portfolio of Shree OSFM E-Mobility includes:

  • Travel Desk Management
  • Roster management services
  • Logistics for corporate events (MICE)
  • Fleet management

The Company recorded total revenue of Rs. 8,261.01 lacs, Rs. 3,079.58 lacs and Rs. 2,978.51 lacs for the financial years 2023, 2022 and 2021 respectively.

Competitive strengths:-

  • The company can leverage its current customer relationships to promote and sell other services or products.
  • Going forward, the company will focus on strategic acquisitions and joint ventures to expand its product portfolio and enter new markets.

faqs.question: What is the Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO is a SME IPO of 3784000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹65 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 14, 2023, and closes on December 18, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO opens on December 14, 2023 and closes on December 18, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO?
faqs.answer: Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 19, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 20, 2023. Check the Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shree OSFM E-Mobility IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 21, 2023.
